title: Centre for the Study of Existential Risk
missionStatement: We are dedicated to the study and mitigation of risks that could lead to human extinction or civilisational collapse
keyQuestions: How much of CSER's work is of high value from a long-termist perspective?

evaluations.title: Shallow evaluations of longtermist organizations
evaluations.author: Nuño Sempere
evaluations.summary: Although I feel like there is a small group of strong researchers working at CSER, the proportion of researchers working on stuff I don't particularly care about or which I don't expect to be particularly valuable according to my values is too high. Commenters pointed out that this assessment is 'almost unfairly subjective.''

evaluations.title: Centre for the Study of Existential Risk Four Month Report June - September 2020
evaluations.author: Haydn Belfield

forecasts.title: What fraction of CSER's research staff is doing high value work?
